name: MR. D6 HAS A DATE
description:
A walking simulator game created by Aris and Cindy.

Controls:
  • WASD/arrow keys and SPACE to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left mouse button to interact with an object
  • Middle mouse button to roll
